::Striker/Mosquitor::

Striker clenches his teeth as an ion disk goes through his left shoulder, 
followed by another. His right shoulder blaster pops up, the left one being 
too damaged to activate, and opens fire on Manterror.

Striker rolls behind a boulder and opens fire as well.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"DIE MAXIMAL!!!" Mosquitor yells as he jumps at Ramhorn, firing acid at the 
maximal.
